text: Hello my Beloved Fatherland! Good morning, my beloved compatriots! Thank God, here in my Caracas again, watching the sunrise! # We will live !!
Sunday, July 24, blessed are you, God's day we declare you! Fatherland Day, Sublime Birth Day! Let's sing to SimónBolívar, elEterno!
Let's sing withPabloNeruda: "Everything has your NameFather, in our Abode" ... "EverythingHis comes fromTu Life" ... "YourHerencia isElPanNuestrodeEveryDay!
I speak to you Venezuelan and My People: let's do today and forever that Bolivar lives in Us, in our ideas, in our behavior of EveryDay !!
Let's sing, We're Consequents, With Our Belonging, About All You, Young People, Venezuelans, owners of the XXI Century Home: VivaBolívar, BolívarVive!

The Pres. was approached about the issue and when he asked with the judicial authority he was informed that Mr Hamdan was being released

I want to draw your attention to a topic. The call for help on hunger in Africa last Friday was in the shadow of political developments
We need to show more interest in humanitarian issues with this month's family, which is a distinctive feature in terms of tradition, culture and beliefs.
I hereby invite everybody to be more sensitive to people who are in a very difficult situation, especially in Africa, starvation and thirst.
I get a lot of messages about the problems of our permanent / contracted citizens working in teaching and some other public institutions.
I will forward all these problems to the Prime Minister, especially the teacher appointments.
God accepts your obedience and forgives us and you and all your loved ones. Ramadan kareem.
